features: STATIONARY BIKES FOR HOME - Simply place this work from home fitness machine on the floor or under a desk and pedal to work the leg muscles and burn calories. This desk bike can also be placed on a tabletop to stimulate circulation and tone arm muscles.

ELECTRONIC LCD SCREEN - An advanced electronic LCD screen allows users to view time, distance, calories, count, and total count. These exercise bikes for home use have a large, easy-to-read screen that automatically alternates through a scan feature.

ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE - The adjustable dial on this under desk bike can be easily changed to set the resistance level. The low-tension setting is perfect for rehabilitative purposes, while a higher intensity helps with strength training and muscle toning.

NON-SLIP PEDALS - This desk exercise equipment features non-slip rubber feet pads for added stability and to stop the mini bike from sliding when in use. Secure straps and non-slip grips on the exercise bike pedals prevent hands and feet from slipping.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Plastic and Metal. Dimensions: (L) 15.5" x (W) 13.5" x (H) 12.5". Electronic LCD Screen Requires AAA Battery (Not Included). Some Assembly is Required. Color: Black.
body.description: Burning calories and toning muscles has never been easier than with the Wakeman Fitness Portable Bike with LCD Calorie Counter. The lightweight and portable size is great for sedentary activities, whether that includes under a desk at the office or while watching your favorite TV show! The adjustable resistance can switch from low impact to high impact with just the turn of a dial, making it ideal for physical therapy or fitness training. Improving your health is both easy and fun with this Portable Bike with LCD Calorie Counter by Wakeman Fitness. which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Wakeman Fitness is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended. Refer instruction manual for troubleshooting steps.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser This desk cycle is a lightweight and portable piece of arm and leg workout equipment that helps you incorporate healthy cardio and muscle toning into sedentary activities. Whether you use this workout bike to get exercise during your workday at the office or for rehabilitation while watching your favorite television show on the sofa, it’s a great way to add physical activity to your day.

Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser This desk cycle is a lightweight and portable piece of arm and leg workout equipment that helps you incorporate healthy cardio and muscle toning into sedentary activities. Whether you use this workout bike to get exercise during your workday at the office or for rehabilitation while watching your favorite television show on the sofa, it’s a great way to add physical activity to your day.

Exercise Anywhere Add more movement to your day with this foot pedal exerciser, which allows you to burn calories and tone muscles during any seated activity. Use it while you’re enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing in front of the television in the evening. The compact size means you can even use this cardio machine under your desk at work.

Easy to Use Easily adjust the resistance level using a simple tension knob to get the workout that suits your needs, whether you use the low-tension setting for rehabilitative purposes, or prefer a higher intensity for strength training and muscle toning. Tracking your workout is easy too, thanks to the large LCD screen which displays time, distance, calories, and pedal count.

Slip-Resistant Features The desk bike pedal exerciser has rubber pads on the base for added stability during use, and comes with a 19.7-inch-square non-slip mat to place under the peddler to help protect your floors and prevent slipping. The pedals of the leg exerciser feature improved straps that can be adjusted to your foot for a secure fit and a more comfortable workout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I am exercising as I write which is great since it's too cold to exercise outdoors. The package came with all parts including the necessary tools for assembly plus a couple of extra screws. (No, I didn't miss putting any in.) It even came with a large mesh pad which could be used as a non-skid surface or for protecting floors and furnishings. The computer is working fine. When assembling, follow the manual and make sure to pay attention to which pedal goes on which side turning in the direction specified both in the manual and on the end of the pedal. It was easy enough to assemble, but one of the screws for one of the base parts didn't want to go all the way in. That doesn't seem to matter at all since the base works well enough anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: Recommend for Dialysis’s Patient!Wonderful low impact exercise. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The throw of the wheel is to great for under the desk. Works great when reading or watching TV/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't hold together
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together except the little scanner was hard to get out, had to use a screw driver, takes one AAA battery, not included. Pedals screw right on and fall right off after a few pedals, and so does the knob on the front which seems to be useless and not described on the instructions what it's for. Well, wasn't real expensive so I guess that's what you get. Still easy to use as long as you don't mind putting the pedals back on constantly and can't wear any type of shoes as they won't fit the pedals no matter how small your feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS, SERIOUSLY
reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend anyone buy this product. I had such an awful experience that I will avoid this brand forever.The machine arrived beat up and filthy, covered in grease stains from the excessively oiled pedals. Touching it just to assemble it left black oily stains on my fingers. The instructions were two wrinkly pieces of paper stapled together, written poorly, the screws were rusty, the plastic edges looked chewed up.On such a machine, I believe you're meant to lift the display with your fingers to insert a battery behind it to power the computer. This display was glued on, and the only way to access the battery slot was to lift the plastic shell body by disassembling the whole thing. There was no battery in it so it could never have turned on.The display is supposed to face you while you pedal, left pedal goes on the left, right pedal on the right. It had been, however, assembled backwards, the left pedal marked R and right one marked L. The pedal shafts were crooked and would shift back and forth as you pedaled. The fit and finish were so awful it was off by a full centimeter in some places.it looked very cheap for a $50 price range item. I felt like I'd gotten someone's return with how dirty everything looked.Total disappointment to buy this reasonably in advance as a Christmas gift and have it not function whatsoever. Thankfully, we didn't just gift the unopened box and then find out about all the problems, we tested it first, day of receiving it. We could not have gotten a replacement off Amazon in time for Christmas, so we had to buy a different one in person, and it's leagues ahead of this in build quality and design despite being the same price.Just get another one, don't risk this one. Not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Post knee replacement, great!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for use after knee replacement. As the other reviews stated, there is a drag while using but disappeared after using for approximately 1 1/2 hours at a steady pace. It doesn’t move around if used on carpet and leaning back some. With that, it’s more like using a recumbent bike which is better for my back and knees. It is fairly quiet and easy to use. I don’t feel that this is perfect for long term use. But the price and convenience for use as at home, temporary therapy you can’t go wrong. Luckily I was able to purchase as an out of box unit so I definitely got my money’s worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars computer doesn't work - was assembled backwards
reviews.reviewText: Updating my review....Decided to disassemble the unit to see where the dog would have been mounted.Found a magnet mounted on the opposite side of the computer pickup. Passing the pickup in front of the magnet generated a count.The flywheel and pedals were assemble backwards (Left was on the Right and viseversa).Removed the flywheel and pedals and reversed it.Computer is now working, but should not have had to do this for a $50 device.Increased the rating to 2 stars from 1 star. As others mentioned, as you try to increase the resistance the unit becomes unstable and rocks a lot.This is probably OK to use to actively move your legs, but not as a resistance device.I did not see any grease as was mentioned in other reviews. The band and flywheel were dry. Adding some grease might make it smoother, but I think this would also remove the resistance.****************Bought this early for my son's birthday.Just assembled it and the computer that tracks time, counts, calories, etc. does not work.The computer lights up, but it does not appear to have any dog to trip the sensor to make the actual counts.Unfortunately, the return window has closed and we are now out the $50 that we spent for this gift.

Me gusta porque es pequeño y no estorba y magnifico para ejercitar las piernas y muy fuerte y estable, no se voltea ni se mueve de lugar, y no es pesado, lo puedes levantar fácilmente y ponerlo en un sitio donde no estorbe pero tenerlo a la mano, lo recomiendo ampliamente

reviews.reviewerName: Eduardo Gomes da SilvaEduardo Gomes da Silva
reviews.reviewText: Um ótimo produto, além de bonito atende bem a minha necessidade.

I purchased this for my dad who is having an issue with his circulation. This helps to keep his legs moving even when he's seated. Easy to assemble and you get exactly what is shown. Good quality and competitively priced.

reviews.reviewTitle: very portable and easy to store.
reviews.reviewText: I Love it and do my workout sitting down whilst doing other things. I don't miss out of exercise.
